title: Conda Ecosystem Explained
description: Get to know the conda ecosystem—a vibrant community supporting an open-source, language-agnostic, and multi-platform package management system. Discover conda CLI tools for managing packages and environments, and explore key repositories like conda-forge, bioconda and defaults. You will learn how to get started with conda tools, the important things to keep in mind, and how multistakeholder governance ensures the ecosystem remains reliable and accessible to all.

title: July 2024 Releases
description: Conda 24.7.0/.1, conda-build 24.7.0, and conda-libmamba-solver 24.7.0 have been released! 🎉

title: June 2024 Releases
description: Conda-index 0.5.0, conda-package-handling 2.3.0 and conda-package-streaming 0.10.0 have been released! 🎉

title: Navigating Change in Conda-Build Recipe Formats: Balancing Legacy and Innovation
description: The recent approval of the new recipe format (`recipe.yaml`, v1) does not mean the end of the old format (`meta.yaml`, v0). The conda community must balance innovation with support for legacy systems.

title: Developer Guide: A Tale of Five Prefixes
description: Prefixes, prefixes, prefixes! All the prefixes!
